title: Shantha Bandara removed from all positions in SLFP
body_lines: Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) MP Shantha Bandara, who was sworn in as State Minister for Promoting the Production & Regulating Supply of Organic Fertilizer yesterday, was removed from all positions of the SLFP, SLFP National Organizer MP Duminda Dissanayake said.
He told the Daily Mirror that a disciplinary inquiry would be conducted against him and steps would be taken to suspend his party membership as well.
